sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-header', templateUrl: './header.component.html', styleUrls: ['./header.component.css'] }) export class HeaderComponent { isLoggedIn: boolean = false; username: string | null = null; constructor() { this.checkLoggedIn(); } checkLoggedIn() { this.isLoggedIn = localStorage.getItem('username') !== null; if (this.isLoggedIn) { this.username = localStorage.getItem('username'); } } logout() { localStorage.removeItem('username'); this.checkLoggedIn(); } }
